name: In Harvest We Trust
description:
Goal

The goal is to solve world hunger by harvesting as much as you can as quickly as you can. By upgrading you farmers and hiring more farmers, you can collect more in the silo. Trucks come by regularly to collect the silo. The goal is to get to 1 million as fast as possible.

Controls

Click “HIRE” to open the hire new farmer window Click “HIRE NN” where NN is the price to hire that farmer, to hire another farmer Click the coin on the left of each farmers info card to increase there performance For extra silo collecting click the Tap area with a wheat icon.
